metadata.title: どのくらい/どれくらい - How much/long

sections.heading: What is どのくらい/どれくらい?
sections.content:
どのくらい and どれくらい both mean "how much" or "how long." They're used to ask about:

Duration (how long) Quantity (how much) Degree/extent (to what extent) Distance (how far)

どのくらいかかりますか？ "How long does it take?" どれくらい勉強しますか？ "How much do you study?"

sections.heading: どのくらい vs どれくらい
sections.content:
They mean the same thing and are interchangeable:

どのくらいかかりますか？ ✓ どれくらいかかりますか？ ✓ "How long does it take?"

Usage note: どのくらい might be slightly more common, but both are equally correct.

children.heading: How Long (Time)
children.content: どのくらいかかりますか？ "How long does it take?" どれくらい待ちますか？ "How long will you wait?" どのくらい勉強しますか？ "How long do you study?" どれくらい日本にいますか？ "How long will you be in Japan?"

children.heading: Common Responses
children.content: Q: どのくらいかかりますか？ "How long does it take?" A: 30分ぐらいかかります "It takes about 30 minutes" A: 2時間ぐらいです "About 2 hours" A: 1週間かかります "It takes 1 week"

children.heading: How Much (Amount)
children.content: どのくらい食べますか？ "How much do you eat?" どれくらい飲みますか？ "How much do you drink?" どのくらい買いますか？ "How much will you buy?"

children.heading: Common Responses
children.content: Q: どのくらい食べますか？ "How much do you eat?" A: 茶碗2杯ぐらい食べます "I eat about 2 bowls" A: たくさん食べます "I eat a lot" A: 少しだけです "Just a little"

children.heading: How Far
children.content: どのくらい歩きますか？ "How far will you walk?" どれくらいありますか？ "How far is it?" 家からどのくらいですか？ "How far is it from your house?"

children.heading: Common Responses
children.content: Q: 駅までどのくらいですか？ "How far is it to the station?" A: 10分ぐらいです "About 10 minutes" A: 1キロぐらいです "About 1 kilometer" A: 近いです "It's close"

children.heading: How Often
children.content: どのくらい運動しますか？ "How often do you exercise?" どれくらい会いますか？ "How often do you meet?" どのくらい日本に行きますか？ "How often do you go to Japan?"

children.heading: Common Responses
children.content: Q: どのくらい運動しますか？ "How often do you exercise?" A: 週に3回ぐらいです "About 3 times a week" A: 毎日します "I do it every day" A: たまにします "I do it occasionally"

children.heading: To What Extent
children.content: どのくらい日本語がわかりますか？ "How much Japanese do you understand?" どれくらい上手ですか？ "How good are you?" どのくらい好きですか？ "How much do you like it?"

children.heading: Common Responses
children.content: Q: どのくらい日本語がわかりますか？ "How much Japanese do you understand?" A: 少しわかります "I understand a little" A: だいたいわかります "I understand most of it" A: 全然わかりません "I don't understand at all"

children.heading: どのくらい + Verb
children.content: どのくらい勉強しますか？ "How long/much do you study?" どのくらい待ちますか？ "How long will you wait?" どのくらい働きますか？ "How long do you work?"

children.heading: どのくらいの + Noun
children.content: どのくらいの時間がかかりますか？ "How much time does it take?" どのくらいの人が来ますか？ "How many people will come?" どのくらいの大きさですか？ "How big is it?"

children.heading: Example 1: Duration
children.content: A: 日本語を勉強してどのくらいですか？ "How long have you been studying Japanese?" B: 2年ぐらいです "About 2 years" A: 上手ですね "You're good" B: ありがとうございます "Thank you"

children.heading: Example 2: Travel Time
children.content: A: 東京までどのくらいかかりますか？ "How long does it take to Tokyo?" B: 新幹線で2時間ぐらいです "About 2 hours by Shinkansen" A: 近いですね "That's close"

children.heading: Example 3: Frequency
children.content: A: どのくらい運動しますか？ "How often do you exercise?" B: 週に3回ぐらいです "About 3 times a week" A: すごいですね "That's impressive"

children.heading: Hours
children.content: どのくらい時間がかかりますか？ "How many hours does it take?" Answer: 3時間ぐらいです "About 3 hours"

children.heading: Days
children.content: どのくらい日本にいますか？ "How many days will you be in Japan?" Answer: 1週間です "1 week"

children.heading: Years
children.content: どのくらい日本に住んでいますか？ "How long have you lived in Japan?" Answer: 5年です "5 years"

children.heading: Mistake 1: Confusing with いくら
children.content: どのくらい - how much/long (duration/quantity) いくら - how much (price only) Wrong: これはどのくらいですか？ (when asking price) ❌ Right: これはいくらですか？ ✓ "How much is this?" (price) Right: どのくらいかかりますか？ ✓ "How long does it take?" (duration)

children.heading: Mistake 2: Using wrong particle
children.content: どのくらい usually doesn't need a particle Natural: どのくらいかかりますか？ ✓ Less natural: どのくらいでかかりますか？ ⚠️

children.heading: ぐらい/くらい (about)
children.content: 2時間ぐらい "about 2 hours" 3日ぐらい "about 3 days" 10分くらい "about 10 minutes"

children.heading: ほど (approximately)
children.content: 1時間ほど "approximately 1 hour" 2週間ほど "approximately 2 weeks"

children.heading: Casual
children.content: どのくらい？ "How much/long?" どれくらいかかる？ "How long does it take?"

children.heading: Polite
children.content: どのくらいですか？ "How much/long is it?" どれくらいかかりますか？ "How long does it take?"

children.heading: Duration
children.content: どのくらいかかりますか？ "How long does it take?" どれくらい待ちますか？ "How long will you wait?" どのくらい勉強しますか？ "How long do you study?" 日本にどのくらいいますか？ "How long will you be in Japan?"

children.heading: Quantity
children.content: どのくらい食べますか？ "How much do you eat?" どれくらい飲みますか？ "How much do you drink?" どのくらい買いますか？ "How much will you buy?"

children.heading: Distance
children.content: どのくらい歩きますか？ "How far will you walk?" 駅までどれくらいですか？ "How far is it to the station?" 家からどのくらいですか？ "How far is it from your house?"

children.heading: Frequency
children.content: どのくらい運動しますか？ "How often do you exercise?" どれくらい会いますか？ "How often do you meet?"

children.heading: Extent
children.content: どのくらい日本語がわかりますか？ "How much Japanese do you understand?" どれくらい上手ですか？ "How good are you?"

sections.heading: Related Grammar Points
sections.content: Question Words (5W1H) - Overview いくら (ikura) - How much (price) Duration (間) - Time periods Frequency - How often Counters - Time counters ぐらい/くらい - About/approximately
